Effect: Become Shadow.name: Effect: Become Shadow
Effect: Become Shadow.description: The shadow familiar transforms its body into barely tangible shadow. It gains resistance to all damage (except force) equal to half your level but can't use any actions requiring a physical form. The familiar can also slip through gaps at least 2 inches wide, or 1 inch wide if it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezes}.

Effect: Fiendish Temptation.name: Effect: Fiendish Temptation
Effect: Fiendish Temptation.description:
The imp offers a non-fiend within 15 feet a bargain, granting a boon of good luck Fiendish Temptation if the creature accepts. The boon lasts for 1 hour once accepted.

Once during the hour, the creature can roll an attack roll or saving throw twice and use the higher result.

If the creature dies while the boon is in place, the imp decides where the creature's soul travels. This typically makes the soul bound for eternity in the imp's home plane, and the creature is unable to be raised or resurrected except by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} ritual or similar magic.

Effect: Fiendish Temptation Luck.name: Effect: Fiendish Temptation Luck
Effect: Fiendish Temptation Luck.description: Once during the hour, you can roll an attack roll or saving throw twice and use the higher result.

Effect: Steam Screen.name: Effect: Steam Screen
Effect: Steam Screen.description:
Your clockwork familiar blows a billowing plume of steam into its square around itself. It gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its Intimidation checks, and any creature in the familiar's square has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{concealment}, though creatures in the square can't use this concealment to Hide or Sneak.

The steam and its effects remain for 1 round.

Effect: Third Infusion.description: This infusion grants temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 hour.
